Question: DeepIntent CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
DeepIntent

CES 2024

- DeepIntent introduces its latest AI-powered marketing platform at CES 2024
- The platform leverages advanced machine learning algorithms to optimize digital advertising campaigns
- It offers enhanced targeting capabilities to reach specific healthcare audiences with personalized messaging
- The platform provides real-time analytics and insights to measure campaign performance and optimize ROI
- DeepIntent's AI-powered platform aims to revolutionize healthcare advertising by delivering more relevant and impactful messaging to target audiences
